title: Wasanbon: Wagashiya Tenmatsuki
original_name: わさんぼん～和菓子屋顛末記～
sinopse: This is a 4-koma describing the daily life of a Japanese confectionery craftsman's apprentice, Mochitsuki Souta in training at a long-established Japanese confectionery shop with more than 150 years of history in Kyoto, Japan.
